Since FF will be gonf until Tues she's left Tav and Rion to me.



* Tavatron moved out of Donobot's grip, jogging toward the scene of the 
battle in front of the Cybertronian Fire after she had calmed down from her 
earlier psychic battle. She moved past Shadow Cat, ignoring her words and 
continuing on toward Iron Raptor. As much as the constant attacks were 
starting to annoy Tavatron, she still enjoyed battles, and wouldn't give up 
the chance to participate in one.
Her feet froze suddenly when Vehement shot his giant blast at Iron Raptor. 
Tavatron skidded to a halt, diving to the side to avoid the huge range of 
the blast. Less than a second after Tavatron sat up, she heard Grimmler's 
yell over the comm, throwing herself back to the ground.
The shuttle exploded behind Vehement, and Tavatron felt the heat from the 
explosion. Several shuttle pieces flew by overhead, smashing into the 
shields of the Cybertrnian Fire and draining huge amounts of energy. Even 
before the ash settled Tavatron jumped to her feet, wielding her staff and 
looking around for an enemy to slag.*


Rion/Diana:


"Hey!"

* Diana yelled, running after Rion after he tapped her on the shoulder. She 
stumbled on the uneven ground, but managed to regain her balance and kept 
going. The scanner was now completely out of her mind as she sped up to a 
run, going after Rion.*

"Watch out!"

* She yelled suddenly as she saw a large rock right in front of Rion. Rion 
turned his head to look in front of him, his eyes widening when he saw the 
rock, but he was too close and too fast to avoid it. His foot hit the rock, 
sending him flipping head-first into the sand, skidding a bit before he came 
to a stop.
Diana giggled and ran up to Rion, kneeling down near him to see if he was 
allright.*
